input.name: active
input.label: Activate Inquiry App
input.help-text: Activate to display the inquiry box on your website. When a visitor closes the inquiry box or submits the inquiry form, their browser will remember this and prevent it from displaying again unless the identifier has changed in the meantime.

input.name: identifier
input.label: Identifier
input.help-text: Enter some text and/or number to identify the current inquiry. All forms submitted by visitors will be coupled to this identifier. When you want to create a new inquiry, change the identifier to something new and unique. Please don't use any spaces or special characters other than "-".

input.name: theme
input.label: Color theme
input.help-text: Choose a styling theme for the inquiry form.

input.name: boxTitle
input.label: Title
input.help-text: Add a title to the initial inquiry box where a user can choose to proceed to the inquiry form. For example: Let us know what you think!

input.name: boxText
input.label: Text
input.help-text: Add a descriptive text to the inquiry box. It will be displayed below the title.

input.name: boxContinue
input.label: Button text
input.help-text: This is the button a user will click if they want to continue to the inquiry form. Add a fitting text to the button.

input.name: boxPosition
input.label: Position of box on screen
input.help-text: Decide where on the webpage the info box should be displayed.

input.name: popupTitle
input.label: Title
input.help-text: Add a title to the inquiry form.

input.name: popupText
input.label: Text
input.help-text: Add a describing info text about the inquiry form. The text is displayed below the title.

input.name: popupSubmit
input.label: Button text
input.help-text: This is the button a user will click when they have completed the inquiry form and want to submit their reply. Add a fitting text to the button, for example: submit.

input.name: popupResponseTitle
input.label: Title after form submitted
input.help-text: Add a title to display after the user has submitted their response. For example: Thank you for your reply.

input.name: popupResponseText
input.label: Text after form submitted
input.help-text: Add some text to display after the user has submitted their response.

input.name: question
input.label: Question
input.help-text: Add a question that that requires a short answer, no more than one line.

input.name: required
input.label: Answer required
input.help-text: Checking this means that the user has to answer the question. The inquiry form can not be submitted before this question is answered.

input.name: question
input.label: Question
input.help-text: Add a question that that requires a longer answer, multiple lines.

input.name: required
input.label: Answer required
input.help-text: Checking this means that the user has to answer the question. The inquiry form can not be submitted before this question is answered.

input.name: question
input.label: Question
input.help-text: Add a multiple choice question that you want the user to answer. The user can select only one answer.

input.name: required
input.label: Answer required
input.help-text: Checking this means that the user has to answer the question. The inquiry form can not be submitted before this question is answered.

input.name: question
input.label: Question
input.help-text: Add a multiple choice question that you want the user to answer. The user can select multiple answers.

input.name: required
input.label: Answer required
input.help-text: Checking this means that the user has to answer the question. The inquiry form can not be submitted before this question is answered.

input.name: testmode
input.label: Enable test mode
input.help-text: Enable if you want to always show the inquiry box on every page load, even if you have closed or submitted the inquiry before. Only works in preview/edit mode. When you're testing the form, don't forget to delete your test replies via the Inquiry admin tool before activating it on the master branch.

input.name: fontSize
input.label: Base font-size (px)
input.help-text: By default the font-size will be inherited from the body. Use this field to set a base font-size manually if needed (enter value between 1 and 30).

input.name: popupZindex
input.label: Z-index
input.help-text: Manually set the z-index value here if you need to. By default a z-index value of 99999 will be used. Only use this field if you need to fix issues with other overlapping elements on your site. The element with highest z-index is displayed on top.

input.name: boxZindex
input.label: Z-index
input.help-text: Manually set the z-index value here if you need to. By default a z-index value of 99999 will be used. Only use this field if you need to fix issues with other overlapping elements on your site. The element with highest z-index is displayed on top.
